title: Braith Anasta's fiancée Rachael Lee flaunts pistol tattoo in bikini at the beach
text:
Braith Anasta's new fiancée Rachael Lee has revealed a large pistol tattoo on her bottom during an outing to Coogee Beach in Sydney with herdaughter Gigi on Sunday.

The personal trainer looked sensational in a stylish bandeau bikini top and matching G-string bottoms as she soaked up some sun with the adorable one-year-old.

Earlier this month, Braith and Rachael announced their engagement by sharing a video of the moment the retired NRL star got down on one knee.

Hidden inking! Braith Anasta's fiancée Rachael Lee (pictured) flaunted her pistol tattoo on her bottom at Coogee Beach with daughter Gigi on Sunday

Unsurprisingly, Rachael left her huge diamond ring from Shannakian Fine Jewellery at home as she hit the beach.

The brunette went makeup-free and tied her hair back, while ensuring she stayed hydrated while drinking from a plastic waster bottle.

She doted on little Gigi, who turned one in January, by carrying her across the hot sand and using a white throw to shade her from the sun.

Summer is on the way! The personal trainer looked sensational in a stylish strapless bikini as she soaked up some sun with the adorable one-year-old

Tatt's a surprise! Rachael's ink design on her posterior is rarely seen, but her cheeky-cut swimmers gave an unrestricted view

Leaving little to the imagination in her tiny G-string bottoms, the beauty revealed the large gun tattoo on her bottom.

The ink design on her posterior is rarely seen, but her cheeky-cut swimmers gave an unrestricted view.

The tattoo is a revolver with a flower growing from the end of its barrel.

Heartwarming! Earlier this month, Braith (pictured) and Rachael announced their engagement by sharing a video of the moment the retired NRL star got down on one knee

On October 8, Braith and Rachael announced their engagement on Instagram.

'My future husband and my three darling babies surprised me with the most beautiful, perfect proposal!' Rachael captioned her post.

'I've never been so surprised and blown away - it was pure perfection, I'm so in love and happy! We're getting married!

'Braith, thank you for a perfect morning and the best surprise ever. I love you always.'

'My future husband and my three darling babies surprised me with the most beautiful, perfect proposal!' Rachael captioned her Instagram post

Braith - who was married to Jodi Anasta from October 2012 to December 2015 - began dating Rachael Lee in 2016.

They share daughter Gigi, one, together, while Braith has daughter Aleeia, five, with ex Jodi, and Rachael Lee has an older son Addison, eight, from a previous relationship.
description: Braith Anasta's fiancée Rachael Lee flaunted the pistol tattoo on her bottom at Coogee Beach with daughter Gigi on Sunday.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
